ygData.subject: Re: Divine Aura in PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: I have noticed that even you have successfully cast Divine Aura, you can still be stunned by a mob! WTF? This makes no sense. If you are invulnerable -- and
ygData.messageBody:
I have noticed that even you have successfully cast Divine Aura, you can
still be stunned by a mob! WTF? This makes no sense. If you are
invulnerable -- and you pay dearly for that, by being unable to fight or
cast -- you should be invulnerable! No being stunned. I mailed it to Verrant
as a bug report, Brell knows if they will ever act on it.

== Gilead, dwarven cleric of Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, August 02, 1999 3:52 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Divine Aura in PvP


>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
>I play on Rallos Zek. I used Divine Aura while being PK'd but it did n't
>seem to work. Has anyone any experience of this?
>
>Nynenom
>
